page.title: 17CHURCHGOERS OF HOCKWOLD
page.content: Hockwold has 1 active & 1 redundant church building also a Methodist Chapel. These serve a population of approx.1000. 68 are on the electoral roll of the{C of E;}an average of 20 attend Sunday Services. 50% of all children are brought for{Baptism,}20 attend Sunday School.Parents of the remainder feel children should wait until they are adults before choosing, but they rarely do so.80% of girls are {married}in church or chapel.This is socially acceptable whatever one's beliefs.{Funerals}are divided between church & chapel or the nearest crematorium.The resident Rector is also responsible for a neighbouring village.The{Methodist Chapel}has 10 members.There are 10{Roman Catholics} 1 family of{Johovah's Witness}and a few members of{Pentecostal}Church.
